resources.string: You have experienced a technical error. We apologize.
Error while capturing the image. Please try again.
No sd card found. Please insert sd card to take pic.
The app needs access to your location to determine where you are. Don\'t worry, battery consumption will be minimum.
You have been logged out of the app.
Sorry, please enter a valid email address.
Sorry, need your password to login.
Sorry, need your Phone Number to login.
Sorry, need your Employee ID to login.
Sorry, need your PIN to login.
Sorry, that was wrong. Please check and try again.
Sorry, we were unable to reset your password. Please contact your supervisor.
That\'s done. Please check your e-mail on instructions to set the new password.
Your account is configured to login by %1$s. Please go back and try again.

Please confirm you wish to log into the Azuga Customer ID : %1$s.

Once confirmed, this cannot be changed.
You are logging in as %1$s, as a %2$s from %3$s.
Username (email) entered doesn\'t belong to the selected Customer ID %1$s.\nEither the Username or Customer ID needs to be changed. Please select what you would like to change.
We\'re determining your location, this usually doesn\'t take long.
Error while getting GPS. Please try again.
Give us awhile to search for nearby vehicles.
There are %1$d vehicle(s) around you.\nWhich one are you going to drive?
Bummer! No vehicles around you.\nContinue by tapping on SKIP :)
Something went wrong while trying to pair with the selected vehicle. Please try again
"We've done it! You are now paired with \'%1$s\'"
This will remove your association with the vehicle.
This will make you the associated driver to the vehicle.
This will make you the associated driver to the vehicle.
Something went wrong while trying to unpair with the selected vehicle. Please try again.
We cannot give you a score as you have not taken any trips in the last %1$d days.
Good to be in the top 10 drivers in my group! http://azuga.com
My Azuga driver safety score is %1$d. Working on getting into the top! http://azuga.com

Earn Azuga Rewards by driving safe and improving your overall score.

A consistent score of 85 and above would qualify you in Azuga Awards league.
Trends Data is not available. Please try again tomorrow.
You are ranked at the top as you are the only driver in the group.
You are ranked at the top as you are the only driver in the company.
Your rank (%1$d) places you in the %2$s %3$d%4$s of all drivers in your group.
Your rank (%1$d) places you in the %2$s %3$d%4$s of all drivers in your company.
You do not have any rewards at the moment. We will notify you when your supervisor rewards you for your performance.

BURGER KING® is not a sponsor of the rewards or promotion or otherwise affiliated with Azuga, Inc. The logos and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by each represented company and/or its affiliates. Restaurant participation may vary. BK® eGifs may not be redeemable at all BURGER KING® locations.

Participation by Domino’s Pizza in the program is not intended as, and shall not constitute, a promotion or marketing of the program by Domino\’s Pizza.

IHOP is not a sponsor of the rewards or promotion or otherwise affiliated with Azuga, Inc. The logos and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by each represented company and/or its affiliates.

Maggiano\’s is not a sponsor of the rewards or otherwise affiliated with Azuga, Inc. The logos and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by each represented company and/or its affiliates. Please visit each company\'s website for additional terms and conditions.

See www.walmart.com/giftcardtermsandconditions for complete gift card terms and conditions.

Home Depot is not a sponsor of the rewards or otherwise affiliated with Azuga, Inc. The logos and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by each represented company and/or its affiliates. Please visit each company\'s website for additional terms and conditions.

The Starbucks word mark and the Starbucks Logo are trademarks of Starbucks Corporation. Starbucks is also the owner of the Copyrights in the Starbucks Logo and the Starbucks Card designs. All rights reserved. Starbucks is not a participating partner or sponsor in this offer.

The merchants represented are not sponsors of the Azuga Driver Rewards or otherwise affiliated with Azuga, Inc. The logos and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by each represented company and/or its affiliates. Please visit each company\'s website for additional terms and conditions.

Apply to Account

How to Use

To redeem your gift card visit www.amazon.com/redeem.
If you have questions about redeeming your gift card, please visit www.amazon.com/gc-redeem.

If you have questions regarding the Azuga offer, please contact Azuga customer care at customercare@azuga.com or 1-888-790-0715.
There is no brand available for you to redeem at the moment.\nPlease contact Azuga customer care.
There was an error processing your reward. Please try again.\nIf the error persists, please write to Azuga stating your problem briefly.
Your reward has been redeemed successfully. Press OK to continue.
Oh-oh! Incorrect old password. Please check and try again.
The new passwords entered do not match. Please check and try again.
Current and New password can not be same. Please enter new password.
Do you really want to log out?
Vehicle location is not known or you have not associated with any vehicle.
Address could not be determined. Use \'Get directions\' to navigate.
Thanks to Azuga\'s Where Did I Park, I always know where is my car.
You have reached your vehicle\'s location. Happy driving!
No route found from your current location to your vehicle\'s location.
Your vehicle\'s location has been adjusted as per the latest update Offline mode. Cannot determine address.
You have not taken any trips between those dates. Please choose a different date range.
Fetching your trip data. Please wait…
This trip cannot be plotted because of poor GPS accuracy during the trip.
We\'re sorry, we do not have any contact information for %1$s.
I used Azuga\'s Find It Forward to get to \'%1$s\'.
Would you like to extend the search to %1$d %2$s radius?
We tried really hard, but there are no places as far as the app can search.
The app needs access to your location to determine where you are. Don\'t worry, battery consumption will be minimum.
Please select any category from the toolbar on top to find places around you
Selected radius of %1$d %2$s crossed. Do you want to continue search?
%1$d items already selected. Unselect some item to select another.
You have already accepted the EULA at %1$s
Error while fetching data. Tap to retry.
Comments can not be empty please type your feedback.
Thanks for writing to Azuga. We will get in touch with you soon.
Bluetooth must always be ON to communicate with your vehicle.
Don\'t worry, this will have minimum impact on battery.
Firing up Bluetooth on your mobile! Hold on…
Please ensure your vehicle\'s engine is running.
Please wait while we connect to the vehicle.
Bummer! No vehicles were found using Bluetooth pairing.
Please ensure your vehicle\'s engine is running.
You are now associated with your vehicle.
We encounterd a error while scanning for vehicles nearby.
We could not establish a bluetooth connection.
You are no longer associated with your vehicle.
You are now automatically paired with the vehicle.
You are no longer paired with the vehicle.
Due to an error, we could not pair you with the vehicle. Please open the app and try again.
Comparing with company will increase your data usage.
Set time period for comparing average driver scores and rankings
Join trips with stop time less than 10 minutes.
Choose any 3 details you would like to see with your trips.
Show maps using satellite photograph data.
Enable this to choose the map theme based on the time of day when you use the app. A dark theme will be applied during low light conditions.
The radius to search for places around you.
Choose at least 2 and at most 6 places of interest to be searched from the toolbar.
Choose at least 2 and at most 6 places of interest to be search from the toolbar.
Please select one theme from the list below and see a preview of New York above.
Are you sure you want to delete the conversation with %1$s?
Unfortunately, there are no contacts you can start a conversation with. Please reach out to your manager to get this going.
Setting up your chat account. Please wait
No Internet connection. Please check and try again.
We are fetching the list of your contacts. Please try again in some time.
You need to choose at least 2 participant to start a group chat
Inserting Location: Location is unknown yet
Are you sure you want to delete message?
Please enter the name for this group and tap on the button below to start the conversation
Chatting among drivers is disabled by your admin
This conversation got deleted from the server
You do not have any conversations. Tap on the button below to get started.

It appears that you already have a TrackMe request which is valid until %1$s. Do you want to use the existing request or create a new one?

Note: Creating a new link will invalidate the previous link.
Saving to phone storaged failed. Please try again.
Forced Shift End due to logout
Forced Shift End as feature is removed.
Feature has been disabled. Please contact your administrator.
Were you injured during this shift?
Phone time is out of sync. Please fix by enabling auto time update in phone settings.
Now get roadside assistance from Signature Motor Club powered by Allstate. Stay safe and productive!
Live Status feature available for Fleet Managers. Live Status provides the latest LIVE snapshot of a fleet.
Utility to diagnose engine health and trouble codes. Connect with Bluetooth to check your vehicle\'s health!
Utility to determine the health and performance of your vehicle\'s battery
Fresh look to the Installation utility with added support for OBD-II devices
Login using a 4-digit PIN or using your employee ID (needs setup on the web application)
Starbucks Gift Card added to the Azuga Rewards stack
Trips recorded via Taxi-IO are now reported to the Azuga web application for fleet managers to report
Logs and database are now encrypted
Realtime location tracking through bluetooth connection
Use Taxi-IO to log trips based on a manual input of trip start and trip stop. Similar to a taxi meter.
Added an inspection survey at the end of each shift
Location service usage reduced to improve battery life
View the exact route under Trip Logs using bluetooth and location intelligence
Add-on utility for drivers to make money by helping Azuga generate fresh leads
Create a TrackMe link using the quick action shortcut from Messaging
Easily forward messages to other users
Share your location with friends and co-workers using TrackMe
Now send files and documents as attachments while chatting with other users
Find a collection of useful apps handpicked exclusively for you under Featured App Gallery
Set up and install asset trackers easily using the installation module
More refined permission handling for Android M
Add and manage participants within a team conversation.
New designs and a fresh experience on vehicle pairing.
Smart, automatic pairing triggers within the app.
Customize the look and feel of your maps from the app\'s settings.
Responsive Dashboard for easy access of features.
Fixed a bug where the app would pair even when the vehicle is stationary.
Cool, exciting design for Azuga Rewards and Gift Cards.
Start group conversations with your team for real time collaboration.
Significant improvements to messaging and conversations.
Flexibility to work on carrier free Danlaw OBD-II devices.
New additions to the Dashboard with faster access to FAQ section.
Add-on utility for asset tracker installations
No more of those pesky pair notification reminders!
Use Azuga\'s DriveSafe to block distractions and encourage safe driving.
Background services to maintain bluetooth pairing and efficient monitoring.
Real time data capture using Google Forms and Custom Reporting.
Set Operating Hours and specify custom rules to control app behavior.
Analyse your best and worst scores through our interactive charts and graphs.
Loads of UI improvements to make the app look even more crisp!
Advanced remote debugging options for Azuga Support.
Added time offset to eliminate the nasty time bug.
Better user on-boarding through a simple wizard.
Scores are color coded based on safety indicators.
Provide app ratings from within the app.
Log your shifts and breaks using Timecards.
Classify trips as Business or Personal for expense reporting.
Real time video capture for risky events.
Redeem your rewards with Jiffy Lube and Darden\'s.
Get alerts when your vehicle needs a health check.
Monitor Distracted Driving on the application.
Chat with other users through our Messaging feature.
Improved design to view trip history.
Check your safety rank in Leaderboard.
Get alerts when your vehicle is running low on fuel.
New score for idling and acceleration.
Knowledge Base added to the application.
Control the app from Settings on the Dashboard.
Upload profile pictures and get social!
View safety scores and compare against your fleet.
If you enjoy using the Azuga FleetMobile app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won\'t take more than a minute. Thank you for your support!
Azuga FleetMobile required Google Play Service to work properly.
Fetching scores for the last week
Please grant access to Azuga FleetMobile on the next screen for the app to work smoothly.
There were no risky events observed on your trips for %1$s.
There were no risky events observed on your trips between %1$s and %2$s.
Congrats! You have a new reward from %1$s. Claim it now!
Your latest driver score is %1$s. Tap to know more.
You are no longer paired with %1$s.
If you are driving, you need to be paired with the vehicle. Tap to pair.
Session cleared by fleet manager or Azuga Support.
Your vehicle needs a visit to the nearest mechanic. Find one now?
Azuga DriveSafe helps you prevent distractions and phone usage while you drive!
Fix permission to use allowed apps
Your Phone doesn\'t support permission required to allow you to use WhiteListed apps.

To make sure you have access to allowed applications and numbers, you need to grant access to Azuga FleetMobile by following these steps:

1. Click on Allow
2. Pull over to the side
3. Grant access and your all set.
You have %1$d calls that were blocked as part of Azuga DriveSafe. Please check your call logs for more details.
No forms available.\nPlease contact Azuga customer care.
The Azuga OBB-II device gets installed onto cars manufactured after 2006. Installation is as simple as plugging it into the OBD-II port and that’s it. Tap to install this device.
The Azuga Asset Tracker can be used to determine whereabouts of your important assets. This device is capable of transmitting data even without an external power source. Tap to install this device.

The rechargeable asset tracker comes with a weatherproof and ruggedised enclosure for use in severe weather conditions. This device requires a hard-wire installation with the asset to be tracked. Tap to install this device.
Focus the %1$s barcode inside the viewfinder for scanning.
Error occurred during scan. Please try again.
Device Serial Number should be numeric.
Asset Id can not be more than 20 characters.
Please confirm if the %1$s %2$s is correct?
Are you sure you want to submit?
This is the serial number found on the label printed on the Asset Tracker Device. You could also scan the barcode that is on the label.
This is the unique number identifying the asset being tracked. Usually, there will be a label that has this information along with a code you can scan.
Focus the barcode inside the viewfinder for scanning.
Please scan Serial Number barcode on your device.
Serial Number is mandatory please enter or scan the Serial Number.
Plug the device into the OBD2 port in your vehicle.
(This port is under your driver\'s side dashboard or on the side of the foot well. It may be in a compartment which would require opening or removing the compartment door.)
Step 2: Turn on the vehicle ignition
Turn the vehicle on and let it run for 60 seconds.
This is taking longer than expected.
1) Make sure device is plugged in firmly and lights up when ignition is turned on.
2) Please double check that the vehicle you are installing the device in is already on your account.
Bluetooth pairing feature has been removed for your login. Please fill the required vehicle details manually in next screen.
Invalid VIN. Please enter alphanumeric characters only. The allowable length is between 17–20 characters.
License plate number should not have any special characters except -, _, and space. The allowable length is between 3–20 characters.
You are ready to start using Azuga Fleet Mobile! Drive Safely – Every Mile Matters.
Error while updating vehicle details. Please make sure you have entered correct Serial Number.
Azuga FleetMobile requires some permission to work smoothly. If denied app won\'t work as expected.

App requires all permission to work smoothly. You have denied permissions to the app with \'Never ask again\' checked.

App can\'t request this permission from within the app and this has to be granted from the phone settings. App will launch the Phone Settings, please navigate to Permissions section and grant all permission.

Press OK to continue.
App requires Camera permission to complete this operation.
App requires Camera permission to complete this operation. Please enable Camera permission from phone settings.
App requires permission to access File system to complete this operation.
App requires permission to access File system to complete this operation. Please enable Storage permission from phone settings.
Azuga FleetMobile requires some permission to work smoothly. If denied app won\'t work as expetced.
App requires Location permission to complete this operation.
App requires Location permission to complete this operation. Please enable Location permission from phone settings.
Azuga FleetMobile requires some permission to work smoothly. If denied app won\'t work as expected. Please review the issue below and if any click on Fix button to grant the permission.

App requires all permission to work smoothly. You have denied this permission to the app with \'Never ask again\' checked.

App can\'t request this permission from within the app and this has to be granted from the phone settings. App will launch the Phone Settings, please navigate to Permissions section and grant all permission.

Press OK to continue.
We have identified that you have modified some permissions. It is recommended that you Logout and Login again in the app for permission to take affect.
Can\'t load featured apps now. Please try again later.
Feature has been removed by the admin. Please contact admin.

The Azuga Team is constantly looking out for apps that can help you.


Get started by tapping the button below and explore a curated range of apps picked exclusively for you.


Do let us know your feedback by writing to us at feedback@azuga.com
Select the duration for which your vehicle\'s location should be shared
Enter the destination so that the person following you can be notified once you arrive. This is an optional step.
I am sharing my location using Azuga\'s TrackMe. Follow me at %1$s

If you ride shotgun with a co-worker every day, how would you like to earn an extra $300 to $600 per month by using your smartphone?\n\nNote: This activity should be performed when you are not driving the vehicle.

Each day, as you drive around you will see many trucks with a business name and a phone number. Many of these businesses can use Azuga GPS, just like your company does.\n\nWhat we need from you is to do the following :

• Note down the name and make a phone call.

• Ask a few questions. 

• Fill out a form on your phone and submit that to us.
Please enter the valid phone number to call.

Great. How many vehicles do you have?

If they do not answer : Thanks for your time.

If they answer : Note the number of vehicles followed by a thank you note.

Got it. Just curious to know what system do you use? A lot has changed with pricing over the last 2 years and wanted to know if you plan on changing to something new.

If they do not answer : \‘Thanks for your time.\’

If they answer : Get the name of GPS vendor and when the contract expires if possible followed by a thank you note.

Hi, I was driving on (say street name or highway name) and I noticed your truck. Can I speak to the person in charge of your vehicles?

If you get transferred :
Hi, I work in (say your company name) and I am conducting a survey on a Driver Rewards + GPS system for your drivers. Do you already use something similar?
The Azuga Sales team will contact this lead shortly. If Azuga converts this into a customer, you will be rewarded with $10x%1$s vehicles, i.e.,
Something went wrong while trying to submit the details. Please try again, or contact Azuga customer care
• On the next screen, make note of the phone number. \n• Please make a call to that number using the \'Call\' button.
You have successfully completed your trip
Device change in the vehicle is detected. Your previous device had an active trip. Please tap on the End Trip button to continue.
You have not taken any taxi trips in last 15 days
Please find attached the details of your trip with Azuga.
Taxi IO works only when vehicle is paired via Bluetooth. Please pair via bluetooth to use this feature.
Are you sure you want to end this trip?
No battery data has been recorded for you vehicle so far. Make sure you connect to your vehicle over Bluetooth to let the app collect the battery data.
Engine Monitor works only when vehicle is paired via Bluetooth. Please pair via bluetooth to use this feature.
Engine Monitor works only when vehicle is paired via Bluetooth. Please contact your supervisor or Azuga customer care to enable Bluetooth pairing.
Vehicle Health works only when vehicle is paired via Bluetooth. Please pair via bluetooth to use this feature.
Vehicle Health works only when vehicle is paired via Bluetooth. Please contact your supervisor or Azuga customer care to enable Bluetooth pairing.
Please select PIDs from the list below
You are no longer associated with your vehicle. Tap to pair.
You cannot connect over Bluetooth because of a recent change on your profile. Please contact your supervisor or Azuga customer care.

You can select a maximum of only %1$d PIDs from the list shown
Though your vehicle supports this information, we will not be able to display as it is not enabled on the device. Please contact Azuga customer care for more information.

Your vehicle looks healthy. No engine diagnostic codes were found.

Something went wrong while trying to fetch engine codes from your vehicle. Please try again or contact Azuga customer care if this issue persists.

As an Admin, you must be associated with at least one Group. Please contact your Supervisor or Azuga customer care for the same.
Allows you to view/modify group selection. Minimum 1 Group must be selected to view the Live Status of the associated vehicles. Maximum 5 Groups can be selected at a time.
Please select the group(s) to view Live Status of the associated vehicles. Maximum 5 Groups can be selected.
Please select at least 1 Group to view Live Status of the associated vehicles.
Certain changes affecting the current Group association have been made. Please re-select the group(s) to view Live Status of the associated vehicles. Maximum 5 Groups can be selected.
Allows you to filter vehicles which are in the vicinity of the particular location based on a defined radius.
Maximum 5 Groups can be selected for viewing Live Status of the associated vehicles.
No driver associated to the vehicle

This could be because your VIN number is not registered or because you are driving a medium/heavy duty vehicle.
